data.name: 动物王国 Demo
data.detailed_description:
The lovely dudu lives alone in the deep forest, needs to collect fruit and honey to go home every day, can you help him?
  • You can pick the food when you touch it.
  • Obstacle can jump or squat to pass. You can step on a bad guy when you meet him.
  • After arriving at the destination, press E to cross the border.
data.about_the_game:
The lovely dudu lives alone in the deep forest, needs to collect fruit and honey to go home every day, can you help him?

  • After arriving at the destination, press E to cross the border.
data.short_description: The lovely dudu lives alone in the deep forest, needs to collect fruit and honey to go home every day, can you help him?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB，Shader model 2.0，ATI 9600，NVidia 6600
  • Storage: 11 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Shader model 3.0，NVidia 7600，ATI X1600
